class.name: ChiSquaredDistribution

javadoc.text: Create a Chi-Squared distribution with the given degrees of freedom.
Create a Chi-Squared distribution with the given degrees of freedom and * inverse cumulative probability accuracy.
javadoc.param: inverseCumAccuracy the maximum absolute error in inverse * cumulative probability estimates (defaults to{@link #DEFAULT_INVERSE_ABSOLUTE_ACCURACY}).

javadoc.text: Create a Chi-Squared distribution with the given degrees of freedom and * inverse cumulative probability accuracy.
javadoc.param: inverseCumAccuracy the maximum absolute error in inverse * cumulative probability estimates (defaults to{@link #DEFAULT_INVERSE_ABSOLUTE_ACCURACY}).

javadoc.text: Access the number of degrees of freedom.
{@inheritDoc}For {@code k} degrees of freedom, the mean is {@code k}.

javadoc.return: {@code 2 * k}, where {@code k} is the number of degrees of freedom.

javadoc.text: {@inheritDoc}The lower bound of the support is always 0 no matter the * degrees of freedom.
{@inheritDoc}The upper bound of the support is always positive infinity no matter the * degrees of freedom.
{@inheritDoc}The support of this distribution is connected.
